note.p: Bookseller, publisher, and dealer in scientific and medical instruments and specimens. Of 32 Fleet Street, London. Bookseller and agent for the Royal College of Surgeons.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1527/188/10)

note.term: dealer in scientific and medical instruments and specimens
